name: Starbucks
description: A popular coffeehouse chain offering a variety of coffee drinks, pastries, and sandwiches. Known for its cozy atmosphere and free Wi-Fi.

name: Café Coffee Day
description: India's largest coffee chain serving coffee, tea, and light snacks. A great place to relax and work.

name: The Bombay Store Café
description: A charming café in Khan Market offering organic food, fresh juices, and a peaceful ambiance.
